page.title: 14TRANSPORT-ROADS AND BUSES
page.content:
Coddington, Winthorpe and the Northern Road Industrial Estate.
The{villages} are served by good {road systems.}The A1 by-passes both. The busy A46 Nottingham to Lincoln road by-passes Winthorpe and the A17 Newark to King's Lynn road passes through the centre of Coddington, carrying an average of 6oo vehicles hourly. The people of Winthorpe are served by{bus services}to Lincoln and Newark. 7 buses run in each direction daily, once every 2 hours. The hourly bus service between Coddington and Newark Bus Station operates between 6.50am and 7.12pm on week days, with extra services in the mornings and evenings, costing 37p. each way. Bus services in the mornings and evenings only run between the Northern Road Ind.Est.and Newark,Farndon & Balderton
